description.zh: whiteboard 是一个基于 NodeJS 的轻量级协作白板/绘图板应用，专为实时协作设计。它支持 PC、平板和移动设备，用户可以进行绘图、书写、添加图片并远程协作。该工具具备高度可定制性，并提供 REST API 用于与其他系统集成。
description.en: whiteboard is a lightweight NodeJS-based collaborative whiteboard and sketchboard application designed for real-time teamwork. It supports multiple platforms including PC, tablet, and mobile devices, enabling users to draw, write, add images, and collaborate remotely. The tool is customizable and offers a REST API for integration with other systems.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 轻量级，易于根据不同使用场景进行定制
- 支持多设备实时远程协作
- 提供全面的 API 和集成选项，便于开发者扩展

## 功能列表:

- 显示远程用户绘图时的光标
- 每个用户的撤销 / 重做功能
- 支持从电脑或浏览器拖放 / 复制粘贴图片或 PDF
- 调整图片大小、移动、旋转并在画布或背景上绘制
- 添加文本和便签
- 将白板保存为图片或 JSON 文件
- 绘图时按住 Shift 键可绘制角度线（使用直线工具）
- 按住 Shift 键可绘制正方形（使用矩形工具）
- 显示参与协作的最小屏幕尺寸指示器
- 所有功能均配有快捷键
- 提供 REST API
- 支持通过 WebDAV 保存
- 支持通过 YAML 文件进行配置
- 支持通过 URL 参数进行动态设置
- 兼容交互式显示屏和手写笔设备
- 支持 Docker 和非 Docker 安装方式
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Lightweight and easy to customize for different use cases
- Real-time collaboration with remote users across multiple devices
- Comprehensive API and integration options for developers

## Features:

- Show remote user cursors while drawing
- Undo / Redo function for each user
- Drag+Drop / Copy+Paste Images or PDFs from PC and Browsers
- Resize, Move, Rotate & Draw Images to Canvas or Background
- Write text and sticky notes
- Save Whiteboard to Image and JSON
- Draw angle lines by pressing "Shift" while drawing (with line tool)
- Draw square by pressing "Shift" while drawing (with rectangle tool)
- Indicator that shows the smallest screen participating
- Keybindings for ALL the functions
- REST API
- Support for WebDAV saving
- Configurable via YAML settings
- URL parameters for dynamic setup
- Compatible with interactive displays and stylus devices
- Available with Docker or without Docker installation
